author: R7.com
title: Coreia do Norte testa míssil hipersônico capaz de atingir a capital do Japão
text:
Coreia do Norte testa míssil hipersônico capaz de atingir a capital do Japão
O governo da Coreia do Norte anunciou ter realizado com sucesso o teste de um míssil hipersônico com capacidade para alcançar alvos...
O governo da Coreia do Norte anunciou ter realizado com sucesso o teste de um míssil hipersônico com capacidade para alcançar alvos a 1,5 mil km de distância. É o suficiente para atingir Tóquio, a capital do Japão, e qualquer alvo no território da vizinha Coreia do Sul. Para mais detalhes sobre este teste e suas implicações, consulte a matéria completa no nosso parceiro Leia Mais em Revista Oeste - Internacional:
[Revista Oeste - Internacional](https://revistaoeste.com/mundo/coreia-do-norte-testa-missil-hipersonico-capaz-de-atingir-a-capital-do-japao/).

title: Ground News - Thief robs 3 Philly pet stores, police say
text:
Summary by Philly Voice Multiple Philadelphia locations of the pet store chain Doggie Style Pets have been robbed in what police believe is a targeted string of thefts by the same perpetrator. The crimes, which took place at three of the chain's locations, occurred between Dec. 16 and 24. Share menu More

author: @nzherald
title: Sheep numbers drop in New Zealand, beef cattle steady
text:
By Gianina Schwanecke of RNZ
The gap between people and sheep in New Zealand is rapidly closing.
There are now about 4.5 sheep to every person in New Zealand compared to a peak of 22 sheep per person in the 1980s, that’s according to figures released by Stats NZ this week.
Agricultural statistics spokesperson Tehseen Islam said as of June last year, there was a total of 23.6 million sheep in New Zealand, a six million, or 21%, drop compared to 10 years ago.
“While that’s a big drop from the early ’80s, I still suspect that’s pretty high in terms of worldwide,” Islam said.

author: @Region8News
title: Harp’s to open new store in Brookland
text: Harps to open new store in Brookland BROOKLAND, Ark. (KAIT) - Harps Food Stores, Inc. will be opening a new store in Brookland in January. According to Talk Business and Politics, the store will be located at 8107 U.S. Highway 49 in Brookland, Arkansas. The opening date is set for Wednesday, Jan. 17, with a grand opening at 10 a.m. The 32,000-square-foot store will also feature a Harps Express with gas pumps. “We are thrilled to open our doors in Brookland and become an integral part of this vibrant community,” said Kim Eskew, chairman and CEO of Harps Food Stores. “Our team has been working diligently to bring the best of Harps to this new location, and we can’t wait to share our commitment to quality, value, and service with the wonderful people of Brookland.” Store hours will be from 6 a.m. to 10 p.m., with the store also offering curbside pickup and home delivery. For more information, you can visit [TB&P’s website](https://talkbusiness.net/2023/12/harps-to-open-new-store-in-brookland-in-january/). Copyright 2023 KAIT. All rights reserved.

author: Reuters
title: Cricket-Australia set Pakistan victory target of 317 in second test | Sports-Games
text: Cricket-Australia set Pakistan victory target of 317 in second test Pakistan made 264 in their first innings and will be up against it chasing down the target given the form of Pat Cummins and the Australian pace attack. The tourists were dismissed for 89 in the fourth innings as Australia won the first test in the three-match series by 360 runs in Perth two weeks ago. [Reuters](/reuters-stories)| Melbourne | Updated: 29-12-2023 06:43 IST | Created: 29-12-2023 06:43 IST - Country: - Australia Pakistan were set an imposing victory target of 317 runs on the fourth day of the second test on Friday after bowling Australia out for 262 before lunch. Australia had recovered from 16 for four after lunch on Thursday to resume on 187-6 on a sunny morning at the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG). Alex Carey scored his sixth test half century with a knock of 52 to help extend the lead before he was trapped leg before by seamer Mir Hamza (4-32) to bring an end to the innings. Pakistan made 264 in their first innings and will be up against it chasing down the target given the form of Pat Cummins and the Australian pace attack. The tourists were dismissed for 89 in the fourth innings as Australia won the first test in the three-match series by 360 runs in Perth two weeks ago. The highest successful fourth-innings run chase at the MCG was the 332 England scored back in 1928-29. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) - READ MORE ON: - [Pat Cummins](/news?tag=Pat+Cummins) - [Perth](/news?tag=Perth) - [Australia](/news?tag=Australia) - [Mir Hamza](/news?tag=Mir+Hamza) - [Pakistan](/news?tag=Pakistan) - [Australian](/news?tag=Australian) - [Alex Carey](/news?tag=Alex+Carey) - [England](/news?tag=England) ALSO READ [Australian woman jailed for 20 years for death of her four children has conviction quashed](/article/law-order/2745253-australian-woman-jailed-for-20-years-for-death-of-her-four-children-has-conviction-quashed) [Greenpeace Australia files greenwashing lawsuit against Woodside Energy](/article/headlines/2745264-greenpeace-australia-files-greenwashing-lawsuit-against-woodside-energy) [Australia win toss, opt to bat against Pakistan in 1st Test](/article/sports-games/2745321-australia-win-toss-opt-to-bat-against-pakistan-in-1st-test) [Pakistan: Imran Khan's pre-arrest bail dismissed in Toshakhana case](/article/international/2745309-pakistan-imran-khans-pre-arrest-bail-dismissed-in-toshakhana-case) [Australian woman jailed for 20 years for death of her four children has conviction quashed](/article/law-order/2745289-australian-woman-jailed-for-20-years-for-death-of-her-four-children-has-conviction-quashed)

author: FERNANDO VILLALOBOS
title: Alexis Vega hace caso omiso a las criticas: 'Me tiene sin cuidado, trato de disfrutar mi vida'
text: Luego de poner fin a su etapa con las Chivas y volver a Toluca, donde nación como futbolista, Alexis Vega rompe el silencio sobre las criticas que ha recibido en los últimos meses cuando aún pertenecía al Guadalajara y como es que esto afecta en su día a día. \u0022Nada, sigo siendo el mismo, llevo mi vida como quiero, con el soporte de mi familia, hoy estamos, mañana no sabemos, tenemos que disfrutar mucho de la vida, tanto fuera como dentro de la cancha y tratar de dar los resultados”, declaró Vega para TUDN. De igual forma el ahora ’25’ del Toluca dejó claro que las criticas que recibe, principalmente de redes sociales, no les da mucha importancia, pues sabe que haga lo que haga los malos comentarios siempre van a existir, por lo que trata de disfrutar su vida sin preocuparse por ese aspecto. TAMBIÉN TE PUEDE INTERESAR: CARLOS HERMOSILLO ELOGIA AL CRUZ AZUL DE MARTÍN ANSELMI: \u0022HA HECHO UN TRABAJO EXTRAORDINARIO\u0022 \u0022Para mí, realmente hay un límite, pero sin duda alguna donde me paro tiene la costumbre de tomarme fotos, lo que hago o subo a nadie le gusta, pero me tiene sin cuidado, trato de disfrutar mi vida, estoy disfrutando muchísimo con mi esposa, hijos, toda mi familia y contentos, cuidar mi profesión\u0022.

author: corpfinwiki.com
title: Best Website for Second Hand Cars
text:
Best Website for Second Hand Cars
Wiki Article
Best Website for Second Hand Cars
When it comes to buying a used car, the internet has made the process much easier and more convenient. There are numerous websites available that provide detailed listings, car reviews, buyer guides, and other resources to help you find the perfect second-hand car. In this article, we will explore the best websites for buying second-hand cars, considering factors such as reputation, search tools, pricing, buyer resources, and more.
1. CarGurus: Best for Cheap Cars
CarGurus is our top pick for finding affordable second-hand cars. Founded in 2006, this online car marketplace offers advanced research tools that accurately assess a vehicle's true market value. One unique feature of CarGurus is its "deal rating," which sorts the results from the best deal to the most overpriced. This ensures that you're presented with the best deals available. CarGurus also provides helpful information on its blog and allows owners to list their cars for free.
2. Autotrader: Best Advanced Search Functions
Autotrader is one of the most recognized online auto marketplaces and offers a wide range of listings for new and used cars. With over three million listings nationwide, Autotrader stands out for its advanced search functions. The website allows users to select nearly any search criteria, including gas mileage, exterior and interior colors, transmission type, technology, and more. Autotrader also provides comprehensive car reviews, finance calculators, and other useful resources for car buyers and sellers.
3. CarsDirect: Best Basic Option
For those looking for a simple and straightforward shopping experience, CarsDirect is the best choice. This website allows you to compare listings from local dealerships, making it easy to find the best deals in your area. CarsDirect's uncluttered website and user-friendly search engine ensure a smooth browsing experience. Additionally, the website offers buyer guides, car news, videos, reports, and a trade-in valuation tool to assist you in your car-buying journey.
4. Hemmings: Best for Classic Cars
If you're a classic car enthusiast, Hemmings is the go-to website for buying and selling classic cars and car parts. With over 10,000 searchable car ads, Hemmings offers a wide selection of classic vehicles. The website also provides a wealth of resources for classic car lovers, including pricing guides, buying tips, virtual showrooms, a blog, newsletters, and multiple magazines dedicated to classic cars. Hemmings also offers advertising packages for sellers, allowing them to reach a targeted audience.
5. Autolist: Best for Mobile Users
Autolist is a unique website that compiles listings from dozens of used car apps and websites, making it a convenient platform for mobile users. The Autolist app, which has been downloaded over seven million times, provides an intuitive and easy-to-use interface for browsing millions of used car listings. The app displays valuable information on each vehicle, including price changes and CARFAX reports. Autolist also allows owners to sell their cars online and provides an intelligent tool to calculate a fair asking price.
6. AutoTempest: Best for Comparing Options
AutoTempest stands out for its ability to compile listings from the largest number of sites, including Craigslist, Autotrader, and CarsDirect. By accessing multiple databases, AutoTempest offers a comprehensive selection of used cars to choose from. The website's smart search pages display targeted buyer guides, and a car pricing tool helps shoppers find the best deals available. AutoTempest also provides useful resources such as car reviews, checklists, and negotiation tips.
7. Cars & Bids: Best Auction Site
For those interested in participating in car auctions, Cars & Bids is the best website to visit. Created in 2020 by automotive reviewer Doug DeMuro, this online auction site focuses on cars from the 1980s and newer. Cars & Bids offers an easy listing process, free vehicle history reports for every listing, and low auction fees. The website ensures a safe and efficient platform for buying and selling modern cars.
Conclusion
When it comes to buying second-hand cars, these websites provide excellent resources and tools to assist you in finding the perfect vehicle. Whether you're looking for cheap cars, advanced search functions, a user-friendly experience, classic cars, mobile accessibility, comparison options, or an auction site, there's a website that caters to your specific needs. Take advantage of these platforms to make your used car buying experience seamless and enjoyable.
Report this wiki page

author: MrE
title: If you need therapy, I am here to listen. - Survey | Quotev
text: uotev Sign up Log in Home Stories Quizzes Create Profile Settings Language Help Terms Privacy I am not a certified therapist, but I will listen. I understand that you may feel like no one has ever gone through this but you, but trust me, YOU'RE NOT ALONE. Published 22 minutes ago ... 22 minutes ago Report Love & Friendship Therapy Survey Poll Add to library » Discussion » Follow author » Share If you need therapy, I am here to listen. Authors MrE 1 7 Welcome to another one of my things. What is going on/ Why are you here? 2 7 If your answer was depression/anxiety/@bu$e/@$$ult/r@pe/PTSD, (etc.) What was the cause/What made you feel this way? Explain what is going on (Just know, that if you don't want me to read your answers I won't. This is for you.) 3 7 Has this affected your focus in work/school? If so, how? 4 7 How long has it been since this happened? Is it still going on? 5 7 Does this affect the way you perform? Do you flinch when others seem like they may touch you? Do you have anxiety attacks when you get reminded of your past or what is going on right now? Do you feel sad, depressed or anxious all the time? 6 7 Has this lead you to think about/do self harm, have $u!c!del thoughts, or withdraw from people? 7 7 If you need to talk directly to me about this, I may be able to help. I'm not a professional therapist, but I can relate. Just message me,and I will get back to you fast as I can. Is there anything I can do to help you feel better? I have a group: Vent, therapy, and help. This is where I will help you. I will be there for you. Show all « » Share answers with author Log in to add to the discussion Log in or sign up
